Uses of Class
uk.me.berndporr.iirj.Cascade

  • Uses of Cascade in uk.me.berndporr.iirj

    Subclasses of Cascade in uk.me.berndporr.iirj
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Butterworth
    User facing class which contains all the methods the user uses to create Butterworth filters.
    class 
    ChebyshevI
    User facing class which contains all the methods the user uses to create ChebyshevI filters.
    class 
    ChebyshevII
    User facing class which contains all the methods the user uses to create ChebyshevI filters.
    class 
    SOSCascade
    User facing class which contains two methods to create Custom SOS filters, in particular where the filter coefficients have been generated by Python's scipy signal library for example: sos = signal.butter(4, 0.1, output='sos').
